meta.fee_euro_approx: 625-1,423 GBP (Visa) + 1,035 GBP/year (IHS). Total upfront cost is high.
meta.min_funds_requirement: 1,270 GBP (held for 28 days) unless employer certifies maintenance. Salary Threshold: 38,700 GBP/year.

documents.title: Certificate of Sponsorship (CoS)
documents.description: Reference number provided by your UK employer.

documents.title: English Language Proof
documents.description: IELTS UKVI (General) or degree taught in English (Ecctis verified).

documents.title: Criminal Record Certificate
documents.description: Required for certain jobs (education, healthcare, social services).

documents.title: Proof of Funds
documents.description: Bank statements showing 1,270 GBP for 28 days OR employer certification on CoS.

steps_flow.title: Get Job Offer
steps_flow.description: Secure a job with a licensed UK sponsor paying at least 38,700 GBP/year (or going rate).

steps_flow.title: Receive CoS
steps_flow.description: Employer issues the Certificate of Sponsorship.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Submit Skilled Worker visa application on GOV.UK.

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay application fee and Immigration Health Surcharge.
